TopicTitle: Orbit map not showing my spacecraft...

Articles.Content: Hi, after downloading some mods, whenever I go to my orbit map it does not show my craft, when I zoom in it just zooms to the line but shows nothing there, and it has seems to changed the orbit map orbit lines a little too, any idea what this could be or did I turn something off, or as a result of a mod?

Make sure the map is set to show the type of ship you're looking for. Mouse over the top center of the map screen and a row of icons will drop down. Those in white are currently being displayed, those in gray are not. Clicking on the icons turns them on and off.

If that doesn't work, it's probably because you're about out of memory. I've noticed this happen, too, and it's a warning sign the game is about to crash. Try exiting the game to desktop and reloading. If that doesn't work, then probably you've got too many mods.
